price: E, dentre eles, há quem te olhe; então, podes guiar os cegos, ainda que nada enxerguem?
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنظُرُ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yanẓuru ilayka afa-anta tahdī al-ʿum'ya walaw kānū lā yub'ṣirūna
